label: Behavior 02795026
summary: Vessel behavior pattern: navigating along a fixed route (the persistent alignment between COG and heading, combined with stable speed and negligible course deviation, indicates the vessel is following a straight, predefined maritime route; the position progression follows a linear trajectory moving south-southeast, approximated by the parametric equations: lat(t) ≈ 54.319417 - 0.0039 × t, lon(t) ≈ 9.713262 - 0.0004 × t, where t is normalized time index from 0 to 1 over the observed segment)

Heading fluctuation: stable (heading varies only between 182.0° and 184.0°, indicating minimal yaw and controlled steering)
